name: Granite Point Partners
overview:
Granite Point Partners is a private investment company that acquires, manages and builds small to medium-sized businesses.

We focus on low-technology business service and light manufacturing businesses with annual revenues of less than $30 million.

We acquire companies with a stable history of profitability, positive cash flow, strong management teams and sustainable competitive advantages.

We offer an attractive exit option to owners of small to medium-sized businesses and provide divestiture opportunities for divisions of parent companies.

Our investors represent leaders from the operating, entrepreneurial and professional investment communities, and serve as a valuable resource throughout the process of building a strong, visionary business.
